title: Contraception: ready or not? (Captioned)
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Contraception
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Youth - Sexual behavior
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sex instruction for teenagers
description: An internationally acclaimed program for teenagers developed to encourage responsible attitudes towards sex. It is not a comprehensive description of contraception methods but designed to stimulate discussion on issues surrounding contraceptive use. Features a reporter interviewing a sperm, an ovum and a group of teenagers to reveal the myths, misconceptions and truths about contraception. Accompanied by a 10p. Workbook.
